```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggdendro)
```

```{r}
clust <- readRDS("data/mazda/processed/clust.RDS")
```

```{r}
plots <- list()
for(i in 1:15){
  plots[[i]] <- ggdendrogram(data$clust[[i]], rotate=FALSE)+
    theme_classic()+
    labs(y = "DTW", x="")+
     theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust=0))
  
  ggsave(plot = plots[[i]],
       str_c("report/fig/dendro_", i, ".png"),
       units = "cm",
       height = 5,
       width = 9)

}

```
